description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Curry In A Hurry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Indian curry,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Curry In A Hurry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small handful fresh coriander leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the chicken and sweet potatoes and fry, stirring, over a high heat for 5 minutes.

Add the curry paste, tomatoes and stock to the frying pan, bring to the boil, reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the peas and cook for a further 5 minutes. Stir in the fresh coriander and serve with warm naan bread.
